txt.en: 'You have run swiftly [placeholder], and have proven your worth - but linger upon my words no longer!\n\n'Those who dally here may never again awaken in mortal realms.'
'Follow me, [placeholder]! Let us feel the rush of the wind!'
As you lean down and drink from the pool, strange visions dance before your eyes, and the odd mist that had fallen upon the forest begins to lift.
Instance: The Wild Hunt -- Gwenaewen's Spirit
You have reached the first lith
'This way....'
You fell too far behind...
'This way....'
You have reached the second lith
Approach the falcon-spirit and prove your quickness in following it.
'This way....'
You fell too far behind...
Follow the spirit to the mystic pool
You must follow Gwenaewen's spirit!
'This way....'
You have reached the third lith
Keep up with the Ancient Spirit!
You must follow Gwenaewen's spirit!
'This way....'
You fell too far behind...
Speak with the Ancient Spirit
You must follow Gwenaewen's spirit!
You have reached the fourth lith
You must follow Gwenaewen's spirit!
You fell too far behind...
You must follow Gwenaewen's spirit!
You have reached the mystic pool!
After speaking with the Falcon-spirit, you must drink from the strange pool to escape from this eerie realm of spirits.
Race as quickly as you can to the next dream lith.
'Kryeeaaah!'
Drink from the strange pool to escape from this eerie realm of spirits.
'Enough, little one. You are swift indeed!'
'Whether you are fast enough to outrun the winds of fate, I cannot say.'
'Go now and return to the Huntsman with my blessing.'
Challenge Gwenaewen's spirit
Follow the spirit to the first lith
Keep up with the Ancient Spirit!
Follow the spirit to the second lith
Keep up with the Ancient Spirit!
Follow the spirit to the third lith
Keep up with the Ancient Spirit!
Follow the spirit to the fourth lith
Keep up with the Ancient Spirit!
You fell too far behind...
Gwenaewen has bidden you challenge an ancient spirit of winds in the Wild Hunt that the Huntsman has set before you.

'Time is always of the essence, for ever is the world changing about us - it will not wait for us to catch up.

'Upon this hill are five points arranged as a star, and between them we shall race. Can you follow me, little [placeholder]?

Come then, and let the challenge begin! If you lose sight of me, you shall be lost....'
